pages.title: Mutant Enderman
pages.text: $(br)Naturally spawned $(key)Endermen$() have a small chance to mutate into a $(key)Mutant Enderman$().$(br)They can also be spawned manually via $(mage/spell#summon)Mana Summon$() or a $(key)Splash Mutant Potion$().$(br2)Defeating a $(key)Mutant Enderman$() drops an $(key)Endersoul Hand$(), which can be used to craft $(mage/spell#break)Remote Manipulation$().
